abstract: The company is considering an investment of between $300 million and $500 million for less than 5 percent of Facebook.
snippet: The company is considering an investment of between $300 million and $500 million for less than 5 percent of Facebook.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 24 — Some people laughed at Mark E. Zuckerberg when he reportedly turned down a $900 million offer last year for Facebook, the social networking Web site he founded three and a half years ago.

headline.main: Microsoft Is Said to Consider a Stake in Facebook
headline.print_headline: Jockeying For a Stake Raises Value Of Facebook

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Andrew Ross Sorkin
